page.title: 14THE MONDAY CLUB
page.content: On Monday a group of about twelve children meet at Harrietsham Primary school as members of a social club. We sometimes go for walks and leave signs made with sticks for others to follow. Occasionally we play rounders or football. When it is raining we play indoors and can play darts, snooker, badminton and other games All children in Monday club make a lot of noise and we have a good time for which we pay 5p.for two hours and have squash and crisps as refreshments There are three adults who look after us, one of whom collects me and takes me home when it is finished. I enjoy going to the club as it is fun and it is better than sitting at home.
